o:EventHandlerTargetItem.a:Name: Validate
o:EventHandlerTargetItem.a:HandlerScript: Function %Validate%(obj, ByRef message) 'Since event handlers cannot be defined under a criterion, first check that the validation is applicable for the object If Not obj.ClassifierMap Is Nothing Then If obj.ClassifierMap.DataSource.Stereotype = "" Or obj.ClassifierMap.DataSource.Stereotype = cMDDE_DATASOURCE_STEREOTYPE Then WriteDebug "[BaseStructuralFeatureMapping.Validate] " & obj.UOL ' Check if the attribute mapping has a valid source object, and if not update it. If (AttributeMappingHasValidSourceObject(obj) = false) Then SetSourceObjectOnAttributeMapping(obj) End If End If End If %Validate% = True End Function
